Text:
Awesome!!! Thanks evilgold! I caught half of this show on Friday, but had to leave before recording the rest. Looked like a great show, with Deepak Chopra. I picked up a copy of the book, which has been a great read for the few days I've had it.

Is anybody going to upload the audiobook version of "The Grand Design"? Amazon just released the audiobook. I would love to get my hands on that, even though it is abridged (doh!).
Hello guys, I just loved that interview...thanks very much for posting, by the way, could anyone record more news interviews of him, I just loooove him...pleaseeee!!!!!!!
